alert.note: Alert for Athens; Meigs; Morgan; Vinton; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Meigs, Washington, southern Morgan, northeastern Vinton and Athens Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beverly to near Lake Hope State Park. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athens, Marietta, Mcarthur, Beverly, Albany, Chesterhill, Lake Hope State Park, Chauncey, Lowell, Stockport, Jacksonville, Zaleski, Amesville, Creola, Stroud Run State Park, Dyesville, Fleming, Bartlett, Devola, and Carpenter. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 2 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
